rationale: The species has a wide but disjunct distribution and it is said to be rare (however this may be due to the small size of the species and that it may be overlooked). More research is needed on the distribution and population trends of the species before a full conservation assessment can be made, and it is considered Data Deficient.
evaluator: Smith, K., Kullander, S.O., Kottelat, M. & Rainboth, W.
